Family Weekend






















Family Weekend



















Family Weekend


















Family Weekend 2022
October 21-23, 2022
Family Weekend is an important event in our community — a time when many students share their lives on campus with their families for the first time. We hope that your visit will give you a small taste of your student's experience in and out of the classroom.
Attending virtually?
Several events will be live-streamed or recorded for future viewing. You can find links to live-streamed events in the event descriptions on the schedule page. In the weeks following Family Weekend, links to any events being recorded will also be posted on the schedule page.
